title: Modern Portfolio Website
description: A modern, responsive portfolio website built with Next.js 15, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. Features incremental deployment strategy, comprehensive debugging, and advanced styling system.

title: Automated Data Pipeline
description: Built a scalable data processing pipeline using Python, Apache Airflow, and cloud services to handle millions of records daily with automated error handling and monitoring.

title: Business Analytics Dashboard
description: Interactive dashboard for business intelligence with real-time data visualization, custom metrics tracking, and automated reporting capabilities.
